tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientMedicalRecords (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_plan TEXT,
  admission_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    visit_date DATE,
    symptoms VARCHAR(200),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    treatment VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  blood_type VARCHAR(3)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment VARCHAR(150),
  record_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Diseases (
  disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(50),
  symptoms TEXT,
  treatment_plan TEXT,
  affected_population VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
 patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_name VARCHAR(50),
 patient_age INT,
 patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
 patient_address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE diseases (
 disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 disease_name VARCHAR(50),
 disease_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE medical_tests (
 test_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 test_name VARCHAR(50),
 test_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
 test_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE diagnosis (
 diagnosis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 disease_id INT,
 test_id INT,
 diagnosis_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (disease_id) REFERENCES diseases(disease_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (test_id) REFERENCES medical_tests(test_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    date DATE,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
    diagnosis_notes VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE lab_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    test_name VARCHAR(50),
    test_date DATE,
    result_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    prescription_date DATE,
    medicine_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosage VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE analytics_data (
    entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    predictive_model VARCHAR(50),
    predicted_diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);
